Hi,

I'm looking for any suggestions folks might have for books displaying 
detailed maps of the Sengoku provinces. Such maps hopefully show 
major (and minor) settlements, fortresses and castles, rivers and 
other prominent topography. The map(s) provided with the game system 
are in my view, while helpful as a start, rather lacking in detail. 
I've found some maps along the lines of what I'm looking for in some 
of the Osprey books (i.e. Sekigahara, Kawanakajima, Nagashino, etc.), 
but I was really hoping to find yet more detail over a larger area if 
possible. I'm even open to primary sources in the original Japanese 
if anyone knows of such books by name. Thanks,

Paul
